ratings.comment: Incredibly disorganized and unclear. That said, a very easy class. Do the readings if you don't want to final to be a pain in the ass, but otherwise you don't really need to do them. A lot of writing! I like that she calls people out when they say something offensive, though she can be intimidating.

Really miserable class for those not interested in the subject.  Took the 3hr 20min summer session, and it was brutally boring, and riddled with malaprops.  Two tests and a presentation, that were quite easy.  25 days and I've yet to receive my final grade, that is just inexcusable.

This professor literally has her power points copyrighted, probably because they are horrendous and laughable. Commonly misspells and makes up words. Her use of words in the wrong context makes her hard to understand. Everything she says is so vague and repetitive that it is hard to learn anything. To be frank this class is a bad joke. Got an A.

Friendly lady. Course is pretty self explanatory and not bad at all. Just requires to study the slides and take notes on each picture and just memorize them. Books aren't really neccessary but its nice to have if you don't know any background on a slide and you missed class.

Ethnic studies requirement. This class consists of memorizing works on slides, and thats it. Very easy, and Tesfagiorgis makes her tests all on material from her lectures. No book needed, although she does assign them (Im guessing for your own understanding of the works). Good decision for non-arts majors.
this class was easy and interesting. she tends to go off on tangents but otherwise its simple: the outside reading isnt really necessary and you only need a day or two max to study for the exams.

i took this class for my ethnic studies requirement... it was alright, wasnt horrible but wasnt great, either. power lectur is a killer, very easy to fall asleep in. but if you memorize all of the hundreds of slides you get for lecture (which by the way are never posted on time), and go to discussion, youll do fine.

There is absolutely NO purpose of buying the books for this course. Save your $$, print out the slides, and memorize the title, date, medium, and author. I thought it was horrific that we were shown 1724 slides but only 15 appeared on the exam.this class is about memorization.take a nap b4 lecture. u'll fall asleep.

The class is interesting. The class and tests are fair. She really tries to help you out by giving detailed review sheets and give out a fair amount of information for the tests. The TAs are also very willing to answer any questions you  may have. I recommend it.
It's alright. The material is relatively interesting and the test are fair. The power lecture can be a killer though.

I took this class as my ethnic requirement. Wouldn't advise it unless you love memorizing exact dates and useless facts of dozens of works of art instead of learning anything useful. Grading scale makes NO mathematical sense. Test grading is ambiguous. She thinks this class is most important thing in the world.
